conditions.description: A list of use conditions that apply to the resources.

conditionTermLabel.description: A human readable name of the vocabulary/ontology condition term, such as DUO ‘Disease specific research’.

conditionTermURI.description: A URI to the vocabulary/ontology term, such as DUO URI: ‘http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/DUO_0000007’.

conditionDetailLabel.description: Optional human readable name of the vocabulary/ontology used as a detail, such as Alzheimer's Disease.

conditionDetailURI.description: Optional URI to the ontology detail term, such as a MONDO URI: ‘http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/MONDO_0004975’.

conditionDetailValue.description: Optional value for the condition detail if any.

rule.description: The direction to interpret the condition term and detail.

scope.description: A scope to state if this condition applies to all or part-of the data in the resource asset that this DUC profile is associated with (see ‘resources’ object).  Whole of Asset should be the default.

profileId.description: Optional URI with unique identifier of this DUC profile (e.g., https://domain/UUID).

profileVersion.description: Optional semantic version of this DUC profile (e.g., 0.0.1).

profileName.description: Optional name of this DUC profile.

ducVersion.description: Optional semantic version of the DUC schema (e.g., 0.0.1).

creationDate.description: Optional date this DUC profile was first created in ISO 8601 format.

lastUpdated.description: Optional date this DUC profile was most recently updated in ISO 8601 format.

resources.description: Optional list of zero or more resources to which the conditions apply. Specify names, descriptions, references and URI to their data catalogue (DCAT) object.

resourceReferences.description: Optional list of web links to external documents describing the resource(s) this profile applies to, such as publications.

resourceURI.description: Optional URI for the resource DCAT catalogue-level object.

permissionMode.description: Optional default interpretation for all unstated conditions.

language.description: Optional ISO 639-3 letter code for the language used in this DUC profile.

otherConsiderations.description: Optional free-text field to add further considerations regarding how conditions in this profile should be interpreted if necessary. This information will not facilitate machine readibility, please use only if necessary.
